repositories.alreadyOriginalRepository: This is already an original repository
repositories.cannotDeleteGrandRepository: Cannot delete original repository using this action. Use 'Delete Repository' instead.
repositories.cannotBackupForkToStorage: Forks cannot be backed up to storage systems. Only grand repositories can be backed up to storage. Please backup the grand repository or deploy this fork to another machine.
repositories.backupForkDisabledTooltip: Storage backup is only available for grand repositories. Use Deploy to push this fork to another machine.
repositories.checkQueueManager: Check the Queue Manager for status
repositories.cleanedUpFailedPush: Cleaned up repository after failed push
repositories.confirmDelete: Are you sure you want to delete repository "{{repositoryName}}"?
repositories.deleteForkConfirmMessage: This will permanently delete the forked repository '{{name}}'. The original repository will not be affected. This action cannot be undone.
repositories.deleteForkCredentialFailed: Physical file deletion queued, but credential removal failed
repositories.deleteCloneConfirmMessage: This will permanently delete the cloned repository '{{name}}:{{tag}}' (cloned from '{{parentName}}'). The original repository will not be affected. This action cannot be undone.
repositories.deleteCloneCredentialFailed: Physical file deletion queued, but credential removal failed
repositories.deleteGrandConfirmPrompt: Type the repository name '{{name}}' to confirm deletion:
repositories.deleteGrandConfirmationMismatch: Repository name does not match. Deletion cancelled.
repositories.deleteGrandCredentialFailed: Physical file deletion queued, but credential removal failed
repositories.deleteGrandWarning: ⚠️ Warning: This will permanently delete the original repository
repositories.deleteGrandWarningDesc: You are about to delete the repository '{{name}}'. This action is irreversible and will permanently remove all data. If there are any forks on other machines, they may become orphaned.
repositories.deleteOptionsMessage: To delete this repository, you must either delete all forks first or promote one of them to become the new original repository.
repositories.credentialHasDeployments: This credential has {{count}} machine(s) with active deployments. Deleting it will make all repositories using it inaccessible.
repositories.credentialHasDeploymentsWithForks: This credential has {{count}} machine(s) with active deployments and {{forkCount}} fork(s). Deleting it will make all repositories using it inaccessible.
repositories.removeDeploymentsFirst: You must remove all repository deployments from machines before deleting this credential.
repositories.machinesWillLoseAccess: The following machines will lose access to this repository:
repositories.confirmDeleteCredential: Are you sure you want to delete credential "{{repositoryName}}"? This will permanently remove the repository credentials.
repositories.destinationMachineNotFound: Destination machine '{{machine}}' not found in team
repositories.destinationStorageNotFound: Destination storage '{{storage}}' not found in team
repositories.failedToSubmit: Failed to submit repository list request
repositories.guidHelperText: Optional: Specify a custom GUID for the repository. Leave empty to auto-generate.
